title: Say Goodbye
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Bring me back the good old days
When you let me misbehave
Always knew it wouldn't last
But if you ask, I'd go again
Yeah, I'd go again
[Verse 2]
It's alright, it's okay
I don't need you anyway
You don't have to tell the truth
'Cause if you do, I'll tell it too
Oh, I'll tell it too
[Chorus]
Well, it ain't easy to stay in love if you can't tell lies
So I'll just have to take a bow and say goodbye
[Bridge]
I'm loosened up, but it's too late to turn it around
I'm dropping bolts on the ground and I'm coming unwound
[Verse 3]
Don't you miss the good old days
When I let you misbehave?
While you're looking down like that
I know that you're dying to come back
Please come on back

[Chorus]
Well, it ain't easy to stay in love when you're telling lies
So I'll just have to take a bow and say goodbye
